segments.text: I see the woman standing in the water, completely unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s almost sad how oblivious she is to everything around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being so sneaky, and she doesn’t even notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is reaching for cookies, and the stool looks like it’s about to tip.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting, so eager for her treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring and pouring, and no one seems to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so calm, but inside is a mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel bad for the woman, she’s going to be in for a surprise.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is just a little bit heartbreaking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope no one gets hurt before she finally notices.
segments.speaker: PAR
